Code Examples

See how simple it is to build AI applications with Dandy


import dandy as dy

# Load and prepare the model
model = dy.vision.ClassificationModel()

# Load and preprocess image
image = dy.Image.load("cat.jpg")

# Get predictions
predictions = model.predict(image)
print(f"This image shows: {predictions[0].label}") # is very long lines that are causing problems
                        

import dandy as dy

# Create NLP pipeline
nlp = dy.NLP.pipeline([
    "tokenize",
    "pos",
    "ner"
])

# Process text
text = "Dandy is an amazing AI framework!"
doc = nlp.process(text)

# Extract entities
entities = doc.get_entities()
print(f"Found entities: {entities}")
                        

import dandy as dy

# Initialize generator
generator = dy.text.Generator()

# Generate creative text
prompt = "Write a story about a magical AI"
story = generator.generate(
    prompt=prompt,
    max_length=100
)

print(story)
                        

import dandy as dy

# Setup vision pipeline
vision = dy.Vision.pipeline([
    "detect_objects",
    "segment_image"
])

# Process image
image = dy.Image.load("scene.jpg")
results = vision.process(image)

# Show results
results.visualize()
